title: alexeyneu
author: alexeyneu
content: v2/v3 scripts (not all, will be clear on compilation of the script).150 bucks@alexneud

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Why should anyone use your robot for trading? You just come up with what people do not know about, no explanation, not showing any function of the robot that may entice people. This is unprofessional and anyone, even me can just come up with what you post and include my telegram link to just want to scam people.

comments.author: alexeyneu
comments.created_time: June 05, 2022, 12:07:09 PMLast edit: June 05, 2022, 12:47:33 PM by alexeyneu
comments.body: you'll need own script anyway. robot ships with noro accuracy one.I have mine ofc but it's not for sale. Main advantage is that no one knows what strategy you're using in contrast of official way with those scripts . it installs on vps and runs ...And there's no support for mango.markets by pine-script maintainersQuote from: Oshosondy on June 05, 2022, 11:39:52 AM not showing any function of the robot function of any trade robot is to buy and then to sell. can go vice versa in perp market

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: To be honest, it's my first time coming across the mango.markets trading platform?From what I have seen, there is just an option to "connect wallet". I have never seen a derivative's platform to require one to connect a wallet, just like a decentralized exchange. Does your tool only work particularly for mango.markets?

comments.author: alexeyneu
comments.body: notice their leverage say on sol-perp . Can be used by the robot. I can tune it to other exchanges that have unlimited access to ohlcv endpoint (binance and bitmex from what i know)
